toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Identifier of this requisition. System assigned when requisition is saved. Uses next sequential number. No user input.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Requisition Number
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poreq_ordno__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Available status descriptions are 1)New, 2) Approval In Process, 3) Approved, 4) Rejected, or, 5) Converted. New requisitions may be created at 'New', 'Approval in Process' or 'Approved' status. Change to 'Rejected' is allowed up to conversion to a PO.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Status
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poreq_status__c
